message.content:
Here's the OCR extracted text in JSON format, followed by the summary and other required fields:

```json
{
  "ocr_text": "Miss Beatrice Vaughn,
c/o Toledo Blade,
Toledo, Ohio.
Dear Madam:

Your favor of the 3rd instant is received together with
the several clippings from the Toledo Blade of last November, and
for which you will please accept my thanks. I was glad to hear from
you and read your letter with interest.

I am gratified with the sentiments you express in regard
to the labor movement, and your desire to be actively identified
therewith.

I should like to comply with your request for a commission
as general organizer, but one of the requirements for holding such
a commission is that the applicant shall be a member in good standing
of the trade he or she represents, affiliated with the American Federa-
tion of Labor. I take it from your letter and also from the conver-
sation I had with you during the Toronto Convention that you do
not hold membership in an organization affiliated with the American
Federation of Labor. However, I feel confident that with the oppor-
tunities constantly arising in your work as a newspaper representa-
tive, that you can not only manifest your sympathy with and loyalty
toward the labor movement, but can be of real help, particularly
through the articles you write for your paper.",
  "summary": "The author acknowledges receiving Miss Beatrice Vaughn's letter and newspaper clippings, expressing appreciation for her support of the labor movement. The author explains the requirement that a general organizer must be a member of the American Federation of Labor, which Miss Vaughn is not. However, the author encourages her to continue supporting the labor movement through her work as a newspaper representative.",
  "date": "1910-01-11",
  "is_printed": true,
  "is_legible": true
}
```
